name: RAPE ABUSE & INCEST NATIONAL NETWORK
description: Hotline Services, public policy and public relations not for profit
sampleDescriptions: RAINN is advocating for reforms to address campus sexual assault, including the Campus Accountability and Safety Act (CASA).
RAINN advocates for funding for sexual assault service providers and other victim service providers and related services during the budget and appropriations processes.
RAINN advocates on criminal justice/crime/law enforcement issues including sexual assault forensic evidence; victims' rights; and investigation and prosecution of sexual violence.
